get.description: Retrieves a list of all product types from the system.

post.description: Adds a new product type to the system and returns the created entity.

get.summary: Gets a product type by its ID.
get.description: Retrieves a single product type by its unique identifier. Returns 404 if not found.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing product type. Returns 204 No Content on success.

get.description: Get the first product where imagelist is empty but product has one

post.description: Test the provided URL and return its HTTP status code (e.g., 200, 404, 500).
